text1: LevelUp is a gamify web application that turns your tasks and goals into exciting quests.
text2: By completing real-life challenges, you earn rewards in the game, motivating you to follow your schedule and accomplish more.
text3: What are you waiting for? It's time to LEVEL UP and transform your productivity into an epic adventure!
t1: Embark on an epic quest with your starter
t3: Unlock captivating avatars for unstoppable motivation
t4: Add friends and check if their score is higher than yours
